channel.title: Pk armours
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
So I'm using a matrix base 667 source, although the source itself was edited my Arcik, so I'm using RsCalifornia, I would like to know how to make pk armors (ie. Statius, Vesta) last longer b4 they turn to dust.
Thank you,
John
